announcements.details: There will be ONE mass on Sunday, 22nd December, 2024. Offertory will be led by the Thursday borns and the Knights and Ladies of Marshall. Bidding Prayers will be led by the Lectors.

announcements.details: The Christian Fathers' Association invites all St Bakhita fathers to an event dubbed “Rendezvous with Father” on Sunday,22nd December 2024 right after day group meetings.

announcements.details: Advent Vespers resumes on Saturday, 21st December 2024.
